result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert A Lucio was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay a fine of $200.00 plus all applicable costs, assessments and surcharges to be paid by 04-05-16 or a civil judgment to be entered.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert A Lucio

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Vacate Judgment $426, defendant is deceased d.o.d 02/07/2016. JM
Vacate Judgment $10, defendant is deceased d.o.d 02/07/2016. JM

Defendant Robert A Lucio not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEFENDANT IS DECEASED.
ANY FINE/FORFEITURES, COSTS, ASSESSMENTS AND SURCHARGES TO BE WAIVED.
ANY OUTSTANDING CIVIL JUDGMENTS, FINE & COST COMMITMENTS, SUSPENSIONS FOR DRIVING PRIVILEGES TO BE VACATED AND/OR WITHDRAWN.
Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $426.00 entered as ordered by the court on 02/02/16 to pay $60.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 09/01/16. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs signed and filed. ccp
Dispo/assessments entered.

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case had been set for jury trial today and was passed to 1pm.  Parties have reached a resolution.  The USE OF A DANGEROUS WEAPON enhancer is to be deleted.
As to Disorderly Conduct:    Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the state, defendant and defendant.  Additional statement by Katrina L.
The court orders the defendant to pay a fine of $200.00 PLUS all applicable costs, assessments and surcharges to be paid by 4-5-2016 or a civil judgment to be entered.
Defendant to be advised of appeal rights.
Invoice forwarded to Accounts Payable in the amount of $437.50 to Dr.Collins for services on 6/01/15, 6/05/15, 6/9/15. Copy in file.

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Parties reviewed doctor's report and do not contest findings.  Defense withdrew NGI plea.  Parties are advised that EFFECTIVE August 3, 2015, this case will be assigned to JUDGE WAGNER, BRANCH 38, in Room 504 in the Courthouse.  Case adjourned for Jury Trial in Branch 38 on 10-5-2015 at 8:15 am.   mld
from Behavioral Consultants, Inc., Dr. Deborah Collins, dated 6-9-2015, received and filed.   mld

ADDRESS INFO for Robert A Lucio
Current: 6927 W Bottsford Ave, Milwaukee, WI   (Effective: 05-06-2015)
Prior: 4720 West Edgerton Avenue, Greenfield, WI 53220

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant entered a plea of NOT GUILTY and NOT GUILTY BY REASON OF MENTAL DISEASE OR DEFECT.  Court ordered defendant to be examined by Dr. Collins (of the Foresenic Unit), on 6-1-2015 at 8:30 am, Forensic Unit, Room 504 Safety Building, regarding the special plea.  Order for Examination under 971.16, signed and filed.  

Victim, Katrina L., appeared to request modification of the no contact order.  Court maintains the current no contact order.  mld

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Dax Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Medical records are going to be requested by defense counsel.  Case adjourned for a further Pretrial Conference in Branch 4 on 5-6-2015 at 8:30 am.   

Statement made by Katrina L., to modify the no contact order.  Court maintains the current no contact order in effect.   

All conditions of bail are continued until further order of the Court.   mld

Court ordered the following name be added to the no contact order, Katrinia L.
Court ordered defendant to have no contact with Maria L. or Katrina L., or their residence.  mld
signed and filed.   mld

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court.  Evan K Glaberson and Nicolas Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case recalled.  Attorney John Krejci was present and agreed to accept the appointment by the Court.  The Court orders Attorney Krejci to be paid at the rate of $60 per hour.  Defendant will repay the County at the rate of $60.00 per month commencing upon the conclusion of case.  Discovery and offer received by defense counsel.  Case adjourned for Pretrial Conference in Branch 4 on 4-15-2015 at 8:30 am.  

Court heard and granted the motion of the State, that the name of victim, Katrina L., be added to the no contact order.  

All conditions of bail are continued, including the no contact order with Maria L. or Katrina L, or their residence, no weapons and no violations of the law until further order of the Court.   mld

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court.  Evan K Glaberson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.  Upon questioning, Court appoints Attorney Krejci subject to his accepting the case.  Case passed.   mldCourt orders Attorney  to be paid at the rate of $60 per hour.  Defendant will repay the County at the rate of $ per month commencing .   Case set for status on .
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-25-2015 at 08:30 am.

Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Court ordered defendant to report for booking and release no later than 3:00 p.m. on 03-10-2015

As an additional condition of bail:
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Maria L.    AND/OR  her residence    AND/OR   her place of employment

No dangerous weapons

Defendant Robert A Lucio in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-046

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.  Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 04.
